body:
I agree with @minux there is already enough confusion around go build and go test supporting `.go` files vs the recommend use of packages. To allow the go tool to fetch a package that has a _directory_ named `something.go` will just add more confusion to an area newcomers already find difficult.

The clincher for me is `package something.go` is not a valid package declaration, so the name of directory cannot match the packages' name.

I vote to close this as unfortunate.
